read_only.description: these fields are not updatable by the API client

primary_contact.description: customer.customercontacts where contact type is primary

other_contacts.description: customer.customercontacts where contact type is other than primary

web_site.description: information only, in case you want to see more about the customer's business

external_id.description: connection of this customer to the same customer on some other system

groups.description: list of groups this customer belongs to

facilities.description: list of facilities this customer's items are stored in, the first is the primary facility

primary_facility_identifier.description: same as the first in Facilities; populated by GET, ignored by POST and PUT

options.description: assemblage of all manner of capabilities the system allows for this customer, scraped together from multiple database sources
